DOC.brief_summary: With research investigator hope determine low dose ropivacaine use transversus abdominis plane ( TAP ) block effectively treat pain woman cesarean section ( c-section ) .
DOC.brief_title: Ropivacaine Transversus Abdominis Plane Blocks Cesarean Section Analgesia
DOC.detailed_description: With research investigator hope determine low dose ropivacaine use transversus abdominis plane ( TAP ) block effectively treat pain woman cesarean section ( c-section ) . The TAP space muscle layer abdominal wall house nerve supply abdominal skin . The investigator inject local anesthetic ropivacaine space freeze nerve prevent pain follow c-section . The investigator compare three different dos ropivacaine ( 0.5 % , 0.25 % , 0 % ) determine low dose control pain few side effect . Participants study receive 0.5 % ( Group 1 ) , 0.25 % ( Group 2 ) , 0 % ( Group 3 ) ropivacaine TAP block control pain c-section . At 2 , 6 , 12 , 24 , 48 hour cesarean section visual analog pain score ( VAS ) pain movement , pain rest , pain cough collect along time first postoperative analgesic request , patient satisfaction score , patient demographic . The analgesic regimen consider effective provide low average visual analog score pain movement . Secondary outcome higher patient satisfaction , good pain control , few postoperative analgesic request , few side effect .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant patient undergo elective csection Exclusion criterion : Allergy local anesthetic Contraindication tap block
